description:
I was looking for a Kodachi replacement for desktop install. In case nobody knows, the Kodachi OS is a privacy focused distro. I liked having TOR Proxy with adjustable exit nodes. SelekTOR does this, plus there are other features, and options.

It is working well in Kubuntu 20.04 LTS.

The notifications facilitate in letting me know when I do, or don't have a network connection. 

Other than that, it just plain cool...
The app seems to be working, but the IP doesn't change / Ubuntu 20.10
Показывает соединение с tor, но не проксирует ни одну программу. Очередное линуксячье поделие не для людей.
